Class DataTypeDate

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataType<ISO8601Date>

    public class DataTypeDate
extends DataTypeSemanticStringBase<ISO8601Date>
    DataTypeDate extends DataTypeBase to implement the XACML Date type with a java Date representation.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.1 $
    Author:
    car

      • convert

        public ISO8601Date convert(java.lang.Object source)
                    throws DataTypeException
        Description copied from interface: DataType
        Converts the given Object to a T object if possible. If the Object is an instance of T then the object itself should be returned, cast to T.
        Parameters:
        source - the source object to be converted
        Returns:
        a T object
        Throws:
        DataTypeException
